evt.summary = "Status is now %d for the tape library." %(evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryStatus) snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" %(evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryCntlrIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqDaTapeLibrary"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Status is now 2 for the tape library.

Tape Library Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a tape library. The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryStatus indicates the current tape library status. The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicates the SCSI ID of the tape library.
If the tape library is failed, check the tape library front panel.

evt.summary = "The door is %d for tape library." %(evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryDoorStatus) snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" %(evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryCntlrIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqDaTapeLibrary"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue evt.component = comp.id break
The door is 2 for tape library.

Tape Library Door Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the door status of a tape library. The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryDoorStatus indicates the current tape library door status. The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicates the the SCSI ID of the tape library.
If the tape library door is open, close the tape library door.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d for the tape library." %(evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryStatus) snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" %(evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryCntlrIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqDaTapeLibrary"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqDaTapeLibraryStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Status is now 2 for the tape library.

Tape Library Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a tape library. The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryStatus indicates the current tape library status. The variable cpqDaTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicates the SCSI ID of the tape library.
If the tape library is failed, check the tape library front panel.

evt.summary = "The door is %d for tape library." %(evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryDoorStatus) snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" % (evt.cpqFcTapeDriveCntlrIndex, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeLibrary"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = 3 evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
The door is 2 for tape library.

External Tape Library Door Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the door status of an External Tape library. The variable cpqFcTapeLibraryDoorStatus indicates the current tape library door status.
If the tape library door is open, close the tape library door.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d for the tape library." %(evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryStatus) snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" % (evt.cpqFcTapeDriveCntlrIndex, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeLibrary"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Status is now 2 for the tape library.

External Tape Library Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of an External Tape library. The variable cpqFcTapeLibraryStatus indicates the current tape library status.
If the tape library is failed or offline, check the tape library front panel and all connections.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d for tape controller %s." %(evt.cpqFcTapeCntlrStatus, evt.cpqFcTapeCntlrWWN) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeCntlr"): if comp.wwn != evt.cpqFcTapeCntlrWWN: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqFcTapeCntlrStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Status is now 2 for tape controller %s.

Fibre Channel Tape Controller Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a Fiber Channel Tape Controller. The variable cpqFcTapeCntlrStatus indicates the current tape controller status. The variable cpqFcTapeCntlrWWN indicates the unique tape controller world wide name associated with this controller.
If the tape controller status is offline, access to the tape library and tapes has been lost. Check the tape library and all Fibre connections for problems.

evt.summary = "The door is %d for tape library." %(evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryDoorStatus) snmpindex = '' for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeCntlr"): if comp.wwn != evt.cpqFcTapeCntlrWWN: continue snmpindex = "%s.%d.%d.%d" % (comp.snmpindex, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeLibrary"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = 3 evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
The door is 2 for tape library.

Fibre Channel Tape Library Door Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the door status of a Fiber Channel Tape library. The variable cpqFcTapeLibraryDoorStatus indicates the current tape library door status. The variable cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicates the the SCSI ID of the tape library.
If the tape library door is open, close the tape library door.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d for the tape library." %(evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryStatus) snmpindex = '' for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeCntlr"): if comp.wwn != evt.cpqFcTapeCntlrWWN: continue snmpindex = "%s.%d.%d.%d" % (comp.snmpindex, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeLibrary"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Status is now 2 for the tape library.

Fibre Channel Tape Library Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a Fiber Channel Tape library. The variable cpqFcTapeLibraryStatus indicates the current tape library status. The variable cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiTarget indicates the SCSI ID of the tape library.
If the tape library is failed or offline, check the tape library front panel and all fibre channel connections.
evt.summary = "Tape library %s is in a degraded condition." %(evt.cpqTapeLibrarySerialNumber)
Tape library %s is in a degraded condition.
Tape Library Degraded The agent has detected that an autoloader unit is in a degraded condition.
Tape Library Door Closed The agent has detected that the door on a an autoloader has closed.
Tape Library Door Open The agent has detected that the door on an autoloader is open so the unit is not operational.
Tape Library Error The agent has detected that an autoloader unit has an encountered an error.
Tape Library Okay The agent has detected that an autoloader unit has recovered from errors.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d." %(evt.cpqTapeLibraryState) snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" %(evt.cpqTapeLibraryCntlrIndex, evt.cpqTapeLibraryBusIndex, evt.cpqTapeLibraryScsiIdIndex, evt.cpqTapeLibraryLunIndex) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqTapeLibrary"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqTapeLibraryState evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Tape Library Status Change The Storage Agent has detected a change in the status of a tape library. The current tape library status is indicated in the cpqTapeLibraryState variable.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d for a tape drive." %(evt.cpqDaTapeDrvStatus) snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" %(evt.cpqDaTapeDrvCntlrIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvBusIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvScsiIdIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvLunIndex) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqDaTapeDrv"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqDaTapeDrvStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Status is now 2 for a tape drive.

Tape Drive Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a tape drive. The variable cpqDaTapeDrvStatus indicates the current tape status. The variable cpqDaTapeDrvScsiIdIndex indicates the the SCSI ID of the tape drive.
If the tape is failed, check the tape and all SCSI connections.

evt.summary = "Cleaning is needed for the tape drive." snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" %(evt.cpqDaTapeDrvCntlrIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvBusIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvScsiIdIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvLunIndex) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqDaTapeDrv"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = 3 evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Cleaning is needed for the tape drive.
Tape Drive Cleaning Required trap. The agent has detected a tape drive that needs to have a cleaning tape inserted and run. This will cause the tape drive heads to be cleaned.

evt.summary = "Cleaning tape needs replacing" snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" %(evt.cpqDaTapeDrvCntlrIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvBusIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvScsiIdIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvLunIndex) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqDaTapeDrvLun"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = 3 evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Tape Drive Cleaning Tape Needs Replacing. The agent has detected that an autoloader tape unit has a cleaning tape that has been fully used and therefore needs to be replaced with a new cleaning tape.

evt.summary = "Cleaning tape needs replacing" snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" %(evt.cpqDaTapeDrvCntlrIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvBusIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvScsiIdIndex, evt.cpqDaTapeDrvLunIndex) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqDaTapeDrvLun"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = 3 evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Tape Drive Cleaning Tape Needs Replacing. The agent has detected that an autoloader tape unit has a cleaning tape that has been fully used and therefore needs to be replaced with a new cleaning tape.

evt.summary = "Cleaning tape needs replacing" snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" % (evt.cpqFcTapeDriveCntlrIndex, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeDrive"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = 3 evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break

External Tape Drive Cleaning Tape Needs Replacing. The agent has detected that an autoloader tape unit has a cleaning tape that has been fully used and therefore needs to be replaced with a new cleaning tape.

evt.summary = "Cleaning tape needs replacing" snmpindex = '' for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeCntlr"): if comp.wwn != evt.cpqFcTapeCntlrWWN: continue snmpindex = "%d.%d.%d.%d" % (comp.snmpindex, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiBus, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiTarget, evt.cpqFcTapeLibraryScsiLun) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcTapeDrive"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = 3 evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break

Fibre Channel Tape Drive Cleaning Tape Needs Replacing. The agent has detected that an autoloader tape unit has a cleaning tape that has been fully used and therefore needs to be replaced with a new cleaning tape.
Tape Drive Cleaning Tape Needs Replacing. The agent has detected that an autoloader tape unit has a cleaning tape that has been fully used and therefore needs to be replaced with a new cleaning tape.
evt.summary = "Server is operational again after ASR shutdown."
Server is operational again after ASR shutdown.
The server is operational again. The server has previously been shutdown by the Automatic Server Recovery (ASR) feature and has just become operational again.
evt.summary = "Cache Accelerator errors may require a replacement module."
Cache Accelerator errors may require a replacement module.
A cache accelerator parity error indicates a cache module needs to be replaced. The error information is reported in the variable cpqHeEventLogErrorDesc.
One or more POST errors occurred. Power On Self-Test (POST) errors occur during the server restart process. Details of the POST error messages can be found in Integrated Management Log
evt.summary = "Server is operational again after ASR shutdown."
Server is operational again after ASR shutdown.
The server is operational again. The server has previously been shutdown by the Automatic Server Recovery (ASR) feature and has just become operational again.

The Management processor failed reset The management processor was not successfully reset and is not operational. User action: Reset the management procesessor again or re-flash the management processor firmware.
evt.summary = "The Management processor is in the process of being reset."
The Management processor is in the process of being reset.
The Management processor is currently in reset The management processor is currently in the process of being reset because of a firmware update or some other event. User action: None
evt.summary = "The Management processor is ready after a successfull reset."
The Management processor is ready after a successfull reset.
The Management processor is ready The management processor has successfully reset and is now available again. User action: None
One or more POST errors occurred. Power On Self-Test (POST) errors occur during the server restart process.
A correctable memory error occurred. The error has been corrected. The current number of correctable memory errors is reported in the variable cpqHeCorrMemTotalErrs.
evt.summary = "Too many memory errors - tracking now disabled."
Too many memory errors - tracking now disabled.

Correctable memory error tracking disabled. The frequency of errors is so high that the error tracking logic has been temporarily disabled. The cpqHeCorrMemLogStatus variable indicated the current tracking status.
evt.summary = "Correctable memory errs require a replacement memory module."
Correctable memory errs require a replacement memory module.

A correctable memory log entry indicates a memory module needs to be replaced. The errors have been corrected, but the memory module should be replaced. The error information is reported in the variable cpqHeCorrMemErrDesc.
A correctable memory error occurred. The error has been corrected. The current number of correctable memory errors is reported in the variable cpqHeCorrMemTotalErrs.
evt.summary = "Too many memory errors - tracking now disabled."
Too many memory errors - tracking now disabled.

Correctable memory error tracking disabled. The frequency of errors is so high that the error tracking logic has been temporarily disabled. The cpqHeCorrMemLogStatus variable indicated the current tracking status.

evt.summary = "Correctable memory errors require a replacement of the memory module in slot %d, socket %d." %(evt.cpqHeResMemBoardIndex, evt.cpqHeResMemModuleIndex) snmpindex = "%d.%d" %(evt.cpqHeResMemBoardIndex, evt.cpqHeResMemModuleIndex) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqSiMemModule"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = 11 evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Correctable memory errors require a replacement of the memory module in slot 2, socket 2.
Corrected Memory Errors Detected The errors have been corrected, but the memory module should be replaced.
A correctable memory error occurred. The error has been corrected. The current number of correctable memory errors is reported in the variable cpqHeCorrMemTotalErrs.
evt.summary = "Too many memory errors - tracking now disabled."
Too many memory errors - tracking now disabled.

Correctable memory error tracking disabled. The frequency of errors is so high that the error tracking logic has been temporarily disabled. The cpqHeCorrMemLogStatus variable indicated the current tracking status.
evt.summary = "Memory Board or Cartridge Bus Error Detected in Slot %d." %(evt.cpqHeResMemBoardSlotIndex)
Memory Board or Cartridge Bus Error Detected in Slot 2.
Memory board or cartridge bus error detected. An Advanced Memory Protection sub-system board or cartridge bus error has been detected.
Replace the indicated board or cartridge.
evt.summary = "Memory Board or Cartridge Inserted into Slot %d." %(evt.cpqHeResMemBoardSlotIndex)
Memory Board or Cartridge Inserted into Slot 2.
Memory board or cartridge inserted. An Advanced Memory Protection sub-system board or cartridge has been inserted into the system.
evt.summary = "Memory Board or Cartridge Removed from Slot %d." %(evt.cpqHeResMemBoardSlotIndex)
Memory Board or Cartridge Removed from Slot 2.
Memory board or cartridge removed. An Advanced Memory Protection sub-system board or cartridge has been removed from the system.
Insure the board or cartridge has memory correctly installed and re-insert the memory board or cartridge back into the system.
evt.summary = "The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has engaged the advanced ECC memory."
The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has engaged the advanced ECC memory.
Advanced Memory Protection Advanced ECC Memory Engaged. The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memory fault. Advanced ECC has been activated.
evt.summary = "The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has engaged the online spare memory."
The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has engaged the online spare memory.
Advanced Memory Protection Mirrored Memory Engaged. The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memory fault. Mirrored Memory has been activated.
evt.summary = "The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has engaged the online spare memory."
The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has engaged the online spare memory.
Advanced Memory Protection Online Spare Engaged. The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memory fault. The Online Spare Memory has been activated.
Schedule server down-time to replace the faulty memory.
evt.summary = "The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has engaged the XOR memory."
The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has engaged the XOR memory.
Advanced Memory Protection XOR Engine Memory Engaged. The Advanced Memory Protection subsystem has detected a memory fault. The XOR engine has been activated.

evt.summary = "Redundancy decreased by adapter in slot %d, port %d." %(evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot, evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqNicIfPhysAdapter"): if comp.slot != evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot or comp.port != evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Redundancy decreased by adapter in slot 2, port 2.

This trap will be sent any time a physical adapter in a logical adapter group changes to the Failed condition, but at least one physical adapter remains in the OK condition.. This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable being removed from the adapter or the Hub or Switch. Internal adapter, Hub, or Switch failures can also cause this condition.
Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub or Switch. If no cable problems are found, the adapter, Hub, or Switch may need replacement.

evt.summary = "Redundancy decreased by adapter in slot %d, port %d." %(evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot, evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqNicIfPhysAdapter"): if comp.slot != evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot or comp.port != evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break

This trap will be sent any time the status of a logical adapter changes to the Failed condition. This occurs when the adapter in a single adapter configuration fails, or when the last adapter in a redundant configuration fails. This can be caused by loss of link due to a cable being removed from the adapter or the Hub or Switch. Internal adapter, Hub, or Switch failures can also cause this condition.
Check the cables to the adapter and the Hub or Switch. If no cable problems are found, the adapter, Hub, or Switch may need replacement.

evt.summary = "Connectivity is restored for adapter in slot %d, port %d." %(evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot, evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqNicIfPhysAdapter"): if comp.slot != evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot or comp.port != evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Connectivity is restored for adapter in slot 2, port 2.

This trap will be sent any time connectivity is restored to a logical adapter. This occurs when the physical adapter in a single adapter configuration returns to the OK condition or at least one physical adapter in a logical adapter group returns to the OK condition. This can be caused by replacement of a faulty cable or re-attaching a cable that was unplugged.

evt.summary = "Redundancy increased by adapter in slot %d, port %d." %(evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot, evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqNicIfPhysAdapter"): if comp.slot != evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterSlot or comp.port != evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterPort: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqNicIfPhysAdapterStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Redundancy increased by adapter in slot 2, port 2.

This trap will be sent any time a previously failed physical adapter in a connected logical adapter group returns to the OK condition. This trap is not sent when a logical adapter group has connectivity restored from a Failed condition. The cpqNicConnectivityRestored trap is sent instead. This can be caused by replacement of a faulty cable or re-attaching a cable that was unplugged.

This trap will be sent when the Virus Throttle Filter Driver detects virus like activity.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d." %(evt.cpqFcaLogDrvStatus) snmpindex = "%d.%d" %(evt.cpqFcaLogDrvBoxIndex, evt.cpqFcaLogDrvIndex) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcaLogDrv"): if comp.snmpindex != snmpindex: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqFcaLogDrvStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break

External Array Logical Drive Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of an External Array logical drive. The variable cpqFcaLogDrvStatus indicates the current logical drive status.
If the logical drive status is failed, examine the array for failed drives that need replacement.

evt.summary = "Accelerator lost battery power. Data Loss possible." for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcaCntlr"): status = getattr(evt, "cpqFcaAccelBoxIoSlot.%s" % comp.snmpindex, False) if not status: continue evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = 4 break
Accelerator lost battery power. Data Loss possible.

External Array Accelerator Board Bad Data. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a Array Accelerator Cache Board that has lost battery power. If data was being stored in the accelerator memory when the system lost power, that data has been lost.
Verify that no data has been lost.

evt.summary = "Battery status is failed." for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcaCntlr"): status = getattr(evt, "cpqFcaAccelBoxIoSlot.%s" % comp.snmpindex, False) if not status: continue evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = 4 break
External Array Accelerator Board Battery Failed. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a battery failure associated with the Array Accelerator Cache Board.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d." %(evt.cpqFcaAccelStatus) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcaCntlr"): status = getattr(evt, "cpqFcaAccelStatus.%s" % comp.snmpindex, False) if not status: continue evt.component = comp.id break

External Array Accelerator Board Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a Array Accelerator Cache Board. The current status is represented by the variable cpqFcaAccelStatus.
If the accelerator board status is permDisabled(5), you may need to replace the accelerator board.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d." %(evt.cpqFcaCntlrStatus) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcaCntlr"): status = getattr(evt, "cpqFcaCntlrStatus.%s" % comp.snmpindex, False) if not status: continue comp.status = status evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) from transaction import commit commit() break

External Array Controller Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a External Array Controller. The variable cpqFcaCntlrStatus indicates the current controller status.
If the controller status is offline(4), access to the storage box has been lost. Check the storage box and all fibre channel connections for problems.

evt.summary = "Host controller in slot %d has a new status of %d." %(evt.cpqFcaHostCntlrSlot, evt.cpqFcaHostCntlrStatus) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcaHostCntlr"): if comp.slot != evt.cpqFcaHostCntlrSlot: continue from transaction import commit comp.status = evt.cpqFcaHostCntlrStatus evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) commit() break
Host controller in slot 2 has a new status of 2.

Fibre Channel Host Controller Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a Fibre Channel Host Controller. The variable cpqFcaHostCntlrStatus indicates the current controller status.
If the controller status is failed, replace the controller.

evt.summary = "Status is now %d for a physical drive on bus %d, bay %d." %(evt.cpqFcaPhyDrvStatus, evt.cpqFcaPhyDrvBusNumber, evt.cpqFcaPhyDrvBay) for comp in device.getMonitoredComponents(type="cpqFcaPhyDrv"): status = getattr(evt, "cpqFcaPhyDrvStatus.%s" % comp.snmpindex, False) if not status: continue comp.status = status evt.component = comp.id evt.severity = comp.statusSeverity(comp.status) from transaction import commit commit() break
Status is now 2 for a physical drive on bus 2, bay 2.

External Array Physical Drive Status Change. This trap signifies that the agent has detected a change in the status of a physical drive. The variable cpaFcaPhyDrvStatus indicates the current physical drive status.
If the physical drive status is threshExceeded(4), predictiveFailure(5), failed(6) or unsupportedDrive(7), replace the drive.

If the controller status is failed, replace the controller.
